div.p: WE MIGHT BE A LITTLE LATE.
TO GET THEM THERE ON TIME.
TO HIDE FROM A SENSOR SCAN,
ONE OF THE MEN IN CRITICAL
TO STAY AND FIGHT THE THING.
WHY AM I KEEPING THE SHIP HERE?
HAVE I THE RIGHT TO JEOPARDIZE
FOR A FEELING I CAN'T EVEN
I CAN'T HELP HOW I FEEL.
MY REPORT IS ON THE TAPES.
IF IT IS THE SAME ONE,
IT COULD POSE A GREAT THREAT
A LOT OF IFS, I AGREE,
IT HAS ONE WORD ON IT--
TO BE ABLE TO USE GRAVITY
PRICE TAG TO YOUR MONSTER HUNT.
HANG YOUR TROPHY ON THE WALL.
IF YOU HAD FIRED, ON TIME
THAN IT DID AN HOUR AGO.
BUT DO YOU REMEMBER I SAID
ON MY WAY TO THE BRIDGE.
COMPUTED AND ON THE BOARD, SIR.
I DON'T KNOW HOW I KNOW,
I PRESUME YOU INTEND TO USE
IF OUR VESSEL IS IN ORBIT
IF A MAN IS BEAMING UP
FOR ME TO BE THE ONE--
I SAID GET BACK TO THE SHIP.
I'D LIKE TO TALK TO YOU
